recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian dish made with spaghetti, eggs, bacon, and cheese
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente
Meanwhile, fry the bacon in a large skillet until crisp. Remove from the heat and let cool slightly
In a medium bowl, whisk together the eggs and Parmesan cheese
Add the cooked spaghetti to the skillet with the bacon and toss to combine. Remove from heat
Pour the egg and cheese mixture over the spaghetti and toss to combine
Season with salt and black pepper to taste

recipes.name: Banana Bread
recipes.description: A delicious and easy-to-make banana bread recipe
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350Â°F. Grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan
In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt
In a large bowl, mash the bananas with a fork or potato masher
Add the melted butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract to the mashed bananas and mix well
Add the flour mixture to the banana mixture and stir until just combined
Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan
Bake for 50-60 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center of the bread comes out clean
Cool the bread in the pan for 10 minutes, then remove from the pan and transfer to a wire rack to cool completely
